# Journal Entry Template

Journal entries are **lightweight breadcrumbs** — 2-3 sentences with links to actual artifacts.

**Format**: Prepend to `/docs/journal/YYYY.md`

```markdown
## YYYY-MM-DD — Entry Title

2-3 sentences describing what happened. Link to the actual artifact.

[Read the synthesis]({{ "/syntheses/example/" | relative_url }}) | [PR #N](https://github.com/...)
```

**No frontmatter. No tags.** Just date headers and content.

---

*Note: Journal entries don't need tags — tags are for artifact discovery (syntheses, knowledge-base), not activity logs.*
